name: NSStoryboardSegue
desc: A transition or containment relationship between two scenes in a storyboard.

items.name: var sourceController: Any
items.desc: The starting/containing view controller or window controller for the storyboard segue.

items.name: var destinationController: Any
items.desc: The ending/contained view controller or window controller for the storyboard segue.

items.name: var identifier: NSStoryboardSegue.Identifier?
items.desc: An optional, unique identifier for the storyboard segue that you can specify using the Identity inspector in Interface Builder.

items.name: init(identifier: NSStoryboardSegue.Identifier, source: Any, destination: Any, performHandler: () -> Void)
items.desc: Creates a storyboard segue and a block used when the segue is performed.

items.name: init(identifier: NSStoryboardSegue.Identifier, source: Any, destination: Any)
items.desc: The designated initializer for a storyboard segue.

items.name: func perform()
items.desc: Performs a visual transition from one controller to another.
